availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: C. G. Warrington (Covington, KY, teamster and tobacco merchant)

body.p: Covington, Kentucky, teamster and tobacco merchant. Virginia native. Married to Mary B. Warrington. Father of Franklin C. Warrington, William W. Warrington, James S. Warrington, Sarah W. Warrington, and Mary V. Warrington. Teamster in Covington, Kentucky, in 1860. Tobacco merchant in Covington in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, Ward 1, p. 212A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, Ward 1, p. 10.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, Ward 1, p. 15A.
